name: kickstart95
description: This [Composer](https://getcomposer.org) project template is a quick way to install the [Apigee Developer Portal Kickstart installation profile](https://www.drupal.org/project/apigee_devportal_kickstart) for Drupal. It installs the following components to make a fully working and configured site, which may be useful for "offline installation" use cases:
